mapper.insert: INSERT INTO good (good_id, good_name, good_label, good_seller, good_area, good_picture, picture_crop, good_price, good_introduce) VALUES(#{goodsId}, #{goodsTitle}, #{tag}, #{ownerName}, #{area}, #{oriPicture}, #{icoPicture}, #{expectedPrice}, #{detailText});
mapper.select: SELECT dealing_id,buyer_name,good_id,dealing_date,dealing_place FROM dealing_slip WHERE buyer_name = #{param1} AND dealing_status = 1 ORDER BY deal_date DESC LIMIT #{param2},#{param3};
SELECT dealing_id,buyer_name,good_id,dealing_date,dealing_place FROM dealing_slip WHERE buyer_name = #{param1} AND dealing_status = -1 LIMIT #{param2},#{param3};
